name: Banh Xeo (Vietnamese crepes) with nuoc cham sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup self rising flour (or more rice flour for gf version)
Red leaf lettuce or leafy lettuce or mustard greens
1 teaspoon chili paste or a chopped thai red chili
2 Tablespoons vegan fish sauce (i dint have this, so used 1 teaspoon soy)

itemListElement.text: The Nuoc Cham dipping sauce can be made 1 day before. Mix all the ingredients in a bowl till all sugar dissolves and everything is combined well. Adjust sugar and spice levels according to taste.
itemListElement.name: The Nuoc Cham dipping sauce can be made 1 day before. Mix all the ingredients in a bowl till all sugar dissolves and everything is combined well. Adjust sugar and spice levels according to taste.

itemListElement.text: Cook the mushrooms and onions in 2 teaspoons oil in a pan for 10-15 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Cook the mushrooms and onions in 2 teaspoons oil in a pan for 10-15 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Add in the salt and chilli powder to taste.
itemListElement.name: Add in the salt and chilli powder to taste.

itemListElement.text: In large bowl, add in all the veggies and the Nuoc Cham sauce and mix well.
itemListElement.name: In large bowl, add in all the veggies and the Nuoc Cham sauce and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Let the mixture sit for half an hour before use.
itemListElement.name: Let the mixture sit for half an hour before use.

itemListElement.text: Prepare batter in a bowl by mixing in all the ingredients except oil.
itemListElement.name: Prepare batter in a bowl by mixing in all the ingredients except oil.

itemListElement.text: Heat 1 teaspoon oil on a non-stick pan and pour 1/4 cup batter on it and spread it by swirling or any other way you like.
itemListElement.name: Heat 1 teaspoon oil on a non-stick pan and pour 1/4 cup batter on it and spread it by swirling or any other way you like.

itemListElement.text: Let it cook for a minute.
itemListElement.name: Let it cook for a minute.

itemListElement.text: Top one side of the crepe with the filling(mushrooms or veggie or both) and top off the filling with bean sprouts and the fresh herbs(mint, basil and cilantro).
itemListElement.name: Top one side of the crepe with the filling(mushrooms or veggie or both) and top off the filling with bean sprouts and the fresh herbs(mint, basil and cilantro).

itemListElement.text: Once the crepe starts getting crisp and brown, fold it half over the filling and press down gently.
itemListElement.name: Once the crepe starts getting crisp and brown, fold it half over the filling and press down gently.

itemListElement.text: Lift up the complete crepe and serve with lettuce leaves and the dipping sauce.
itemListElement.name: Lift up the complete crepe and serve with lettuce leaves and the dipping sauce.

itemListElement.text: The crepe is normally eaten by cutting a portion of the crepe and wrapping it in lettuce and the herbs and dipping in the sauce. Since i altered the recipe a bit, the herbs are already in the crepe, so the only wrap needed is the lettuce leaves!
itemListElement.name: The crepe is normally eaten by cutting a portion of the crepe and wrapping it in lettuce and the herbs and dipping in the sauce. Since i altered the recipe a bit, the herbs are already in the crepe, so the only wrap needed is the lettuce leaves!

itemListElement.text: Enjoy any time of the day!
itemListElement.name: Enjoy any time of the day!
